the origin of something, when it is begun or starts to exist: The story had its genesis in a conversation the author had with his mother.the genesis of research into the genesis of cancer

the time when something came into existence; the beginning or origin: the genesis of life on earth
In the Bible, Genesis is the first book of the Old Testament, describing how God created the world.
